entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
